main_features.name: Adminer Integration
main_features.description: Integrated Adminer tool for managing the PostgreSQL database of Call for Tenders.

main_features.name: Web Scraping Engine
main_features.description: Scrapes EU funding opportunities using Scrapy, extracting data and handling pagination.

main_features.name: Dashboard Implementation
main_features.description: Provides a dashboard for monitoring system status, scraping statistics, and convocation results.

corrective_actions.description: The error indicates that the 'router' object is not found in 'app/routers/tasks.py'. This could be due to a missing import statement or an incorrect filename.
corrective_actions.solution: Verify that the file name and path are correct. Ensure that the 'tasks_router' is properly defined and exported from 'app/routers/tasks.py'. If it's named differently, update the import statement accordingly.
